crazyballrun.game.utilities

Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.utilities.Vector2D

  • public class Vector2D
extends java.lang.Object
    The Vector2D class is a utility for translation and rotation of position coordinates.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double x
      Vector coordinates.

      Multiplys vector y with a and then adds it to this vector.

      Rounds all data values x and y down to zero which fullfill following condition: x² < epsilon or y² < epsilon.

      • cut

        public void cut(double epsilon)
        Rounds all data values x and y down to zero which fullfill following condition: x² < epsilon or y² < epsilon.
        Parameters:
        epsilon - cut-off limit

      • getX

        public long getX()
        Calculates the product of the x-component and the number of pixels one texture consists of and converts the result into an integer value.
        Returns:
        the integer value of the product of x and texture-size.

      • getY

        public long getY()

        Returns:
